Service Details: - Provides outreach services that include Tuesday and Thursday lunches- BBQ in City Park on Wednesdays at 12:00pm (noon)- Breakfast every Sunday at 9.30am at the French Cultural Centre- Foot Care program (by appointment only)- Provides access to bedding and household items- Advocacy services- Wednesday evening men's and Friday morning women's bible studies, spiritual and pastoral care- Volunteer opportunities available
Meetings: Sun: Services, 8.30am and 10am; breakfast, 9.30am Men's Bible Study: Wed, 6pm Women's Bible Study: Fri, 10am
Major Intersection: St. Paul St and Coronation Ave
